subject: This is Mr.Ralph Chami Assista
body:
This is Mr.Ralph Chami Assistant Director of the International Monetary Fund
The USA, We know that you have not received Your fund from United
Nations! we have
finally, cash your abandoned long-lost fund confirming to be your won
compensation funds and we decided to box the money for avoiding the expiry of
the check because it has stayed long in our custody searching for the
contact to reach you, after our investigation, we discovered that the money
is not an illegal payment, The fund values the sum of $4.5 million dollars.
So kindly reconfirm your full details.
Your full name
Home Address
Your Phone number
Nearest Airport.
Sorry if you may receive this message in your Spam due to poor network failure.
if you are not interested in the Funds anymore,
don't insult us only ignore this message okay?
Thank You.
Best Regards
ASST, DR.Ralph Chami.

subject: Re: This is Mr.Ralph Chami Assista
body:
Hello ASST, Chami,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm surprised to hear about this fund from the United Nations. Could you please tell me more about how this fund came into existence? And why was it abandoned?

Also, could you explain why my personal details are needed? I'm a bit cautious about sharing such information online.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Michael
